answers.author: Andrea Fox
answers.text:
Hi Jennifer.  Are you looking for a central location that would have this information, or some assistance in getting this information from our respective mid-size cities?

answers.author: Jennifer Thomas
answers.text:
Hi, Andrea.
A central location would be best. (I actually have 11 different cities to handle.) However, if such is not available, I would need to pursue the second option.
Thank you,
Jennifer

author: Jennifer Thomas
text:
Hello!
I am looking for information on greenspace in medium-sized American cities. Examples include Burlington, VT; New Haven, CT; Lowell, MA and Charleston, SC. I need to know percentage-wise how much of each city consists of greenspace. Does anyone know where I can access such information?
Thank you, 
Jennifer Thomas
title: Greenspace in medium-sized cities
